text: The Saint Louis University Mental Status Exam was developed at the Division of Geriatric Medicine, Saint Louis University School of Medicine in affiliation with the Veterans Association as a screening tool for detecting mild cognitive impairment in a veteran population. ==See also== * Addenbrooke's cognitive examination * Mental status examination * Montreal Cognitive Assessment * Mini–mental state examination * Informant Questionnaire on Cognitive Decline in the Elderly * NIH stroke scale * Self-administered Gerocognitive Examination ==References== Category:Psychiatric instruments Category:Cognitive tests Category:Neuropsychological tests Category:Geriatrics
title: Saint Louis University Mental Status Exam
